commentBody: I think you can't really write this piece without mentioning Eddie's father Eddie DebBartolo Sr.'s numerous (5?) attempts to purchase professional baseball teams and the constant rejections that were rumoured to be linked to published US Justice Department reports linking Eddie Sr. to so-called "organised crime". (Eddie Sr. would argue what they were really accusing him of was growing up in Youngstown, Ohio.) No doubt, certainly a case of sins of the father but the probable influence of these reports on Eddie Jr.'s candidacy for the hall cannot be ignored.
